article.title: GT version Reliable File Transfer (RFT) Service: Migration Guide
article.para: The following provides available information about migrating from previous versions of the Globus Toolkit.

section.title: Migrating RFT from GT2
section.para: This does not apply to RFT.

section.title: Migrating RFT from GT3
section.para: The RFT implementations in GT4 and GT3 are not interoperable, as they are built on different GT core implementations. In order to migrate to GT4 RFT you should follow the installation instructions, which can be found in .
